title: E Pluribus Unum: The Formation of the American Republic, 1776-1790
description: Having won independence from England, America faced a new Would this be politically one nation, or would it not? E Pluribus Unum is a spirited look at how that question came to be answered.Forrest McDonald is Professor Emeritus of American History at the University of Alabama and author of Statesâ€™ Rights and the Union .
author: Forrest McDonald
